Package uk.co.flax.biosolr.ontology.core.ols

Class OLSTermsOntologyHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • uk.co.flax.biosolr.ontology.core.AbstractOntologyHelper
      • uk.co.flax.biosolr.ontology.core.ols.OLSOntologyHelper
        • uk.co.flax.biosolr.ontology.core.ols.OLSTermsOntologyHelper
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    OntologyHelper

    public class OLSTermsOntologyHelper
extends OLSOntologyHelper
    OLS-specific ontology helper implementation, handling the case where the user has not given the ontology. In this case, all terms lookups are searches, and need to be handled slightly differently.

    Created by Matt Pearce on 10/11/15.

    Author:
    Matt Pearce
